data.title: The offices – Consolato Generale d'Italia a Dubai
data.meta_description: Il sito ufficiale del Consolato Generale d'Italia a Dubai
data.text:
Please note that the Consulate General of Italy in Dubai is only competent for the Emirates of Dubai, Sharjah, Ras al Khaimah, Fujairah, Ajman and Umm-al-Quwain.

If you are resident in Abu Dhabi or Al Ain, you shouls contact our Embassy.

The Consulate General is open to the public Monday to Friday from 9:00 am to 1:00 pm.; access to the Consulate Offices is by appointment only (to be requested through Prenot@mi)

We recommend that you carefully read the information on our website and send an email with your questions to the appropriate office and not visit directly the consulate. Please, make sure you have all required forms and documents printed and duly filled before you approche the counter.

Consulate General’s departments email list:

Secretariat of the Consul General

Civil Status (registration of birth certificates, marriages and death)

Notary section/Citizenship/Marriages

Passport Section

Registry Office/A.I.R.E., Electoral Section

Recognition of educational qualifications

Navigation

Accounting

Visa Section
